data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Salsa
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Byzantium and Hispania - and a new trading Good - Salt, and a new Forum mechanic. The additions are modular and optional, and serve to add variety and new challenges to the game.

  • üßÇ Salt is the most valuable of all the trading Goods and can serve as a wild card - supplement any other Good in any trade.
  • üÉè Forum introduces a set of bonus Cards that can provide either ongoing or situational bonuses throughout the game.
  • üõï Byzantium is a 28 City map with 10 Provinces and no new mechanics.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Hispania is a 23 City map with 9 Provinces and no new mechanics.

Spice up your Concordia games today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707530/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Salsa/
data.about_the_game:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Byzantium and Hispania - and a new trading Good - Salt, and a new Forum mechanic. The additions are modular and optional, and serve to add variety and new challenges to the game.

data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Byzantium and Hispania - and Salt - a new trading good - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
